metadata.title: CVE-2022-39334 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: Nextcloud also ships a CLI utility called nextcloudcmd which is sometimes used for automated scripting and headless servers. Versions of nextcloudcmd prior to 3.6.1 would incorrectly trust invalid TLS certificates, which may enable a Man-in-the-middle attack that exposes sensitive data or credentials to a network attacker. This affects the CLI only. It does not affect the standard GUI desktop Nextcloud clients, and it does not affect the Nextcloud server.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
